txt.en: Talk to Oxi at Thurkh Mudmulnalâ
The mirror in Tharâkh Bazân has been rendered useless once more. It seems that the creatures there insist on moving it out of position.
'So the mirror once again reflects light through the halls? That news lifts my spirits.'
'Have you re-aligned that mirror in Tharâkh Bazân yet?'
The creatures in Tharâkh Bazân keep tampering with the mirror there.
Oxi is at Jazârgund, east of Tharâkh Bazân in Durin's Way.\n\nOxi will be pleased to hear the mirror has been re-aligned and is useful once more.
Oxi is at Jazârgund, east of Tharâkh Bazân in Durin's Way.\n\nOxi will be pleased to hear the mirror has been re-aligned and is useful once more.
